input.sentences: the man posed before the camera on the day of his graduation .
the happy graduating class all took a photo together before the ceremony .
after the photo | the group walked in line to the auditorium .
the man happily accepted his degree .
after the ceremony was over | he proudly showed off the top of his cap .
output.sentences: Everyone posed for pictures on graduation day.
The parents made sure to get a photo of the happy students graduating.
Someone even got a photo of the students as they walked in a line.
But our favorite photo was of my brother as he happily accepted his degree.
He was one of the top students proudly recognized at the ceremony
